_meanings:
{@--1@} Going, moving,
walking; as in {#rAmAyaRaM#}.

{@--3@} A place, site,
abode, place of resort; {#tA yadasyAyanaM#}
{#pUrvaM#} <ls>Ms. 1. 10</ls> (occurring in the 
derivation of the word {#nArAyaRa#}).

{@--4@} A
way of entrance, an entrance (to 

an array of troops or {#vyUha#}); {#ayanezu#}
{#ca sarvezu yaTABAgamavAsTitAH#} <ls>Bg. 1. 11.</ls>

{@--5@} Rotation, circulation period;  
{#aMgirasAM ayanaM; izwi°, paSu°#}.

{@--6@} A particular
period in the year for the 
performance of particular sacrificial or
other religious works; <ab>N.</ab> of 
certain sacrificial performances; as
{#gavAmayanaM#}.

{@--7@} The sun's passage, north
and south of the equator.

{@--8@} (Hence)
The period of duration of this 
passage, half year, the time from one
solstice to another; see {#uttarAyaRa#}
and {#dakziRAyana#}; <ab>cf.</ab> also {#sAyana#} and  
{#nirayaRa#}.

{@--9@} The equinoctial and 
solstitial points; {#dakziRaM ayanaM#} winter
solstice; {#uttaraM ayanaM#} summer 
solstice.
{@--10@} Method, manner, way.

{@--12@} Final emancipation;
{#nAnyaH paMTA vidyate'yanAya#} <ls>Śvet. Up.</ls>
{@--13@} A commentary; treatise.

the are between the vernal 
equinoctial point and the beginning of
the fixed zodiac or first point in
Aries.

the interval between
the solstices.

a month caused
by {%ayanamsa%}.
passage through the zodiac.
the ecliptic.
